sentences.en: "Lorna Doone" is subtitled "a Romance of Exmoor".
sentences.cn: 小说《罗娜·杜恩》的副标题是“埃克斯穆尔绝恋”。

sentences.en: All this questioning is so analytical and clinical — it kills romance.
sentences.cn: 整个询问分析性和逻辑性太强，浪漫的气息荡然无存。

sentences.en: He got married after a whirlwind romance.
sentences.cn: 在一场旋风式的恋爱后他很快就结婚了。

sentences.en: Hemingway’s romance with his nurse inspired him to write ‘A Farewell to Arms’.
sentences.cn: 海明威和他护士之间的罗曼史赋予他灵感写出《永别了，武器》。

sentences.en: I was reading some trashy romance novel.
sentences.cn: 我正在读一本写得很烂的言情小说。

sentences.en: I'm such a sucker for romance.
sentences.cn: 我对浪漫毫无招架之力。

sentences.en: It is ridiculous to suggest we are having a romance.
sentences.cn: 暗示我们正在谈恋爱的说法真是太荒谬了。

sentences.en: It was a real storybook romance.
sentences.cn: 这是发生在现实中的童话般的罗曼史。

sentences.en: Jane's and Paul's life together is full of romance.
sentences.cn: 简和保罗的共同生活充满了浪漫色彩.

sentences.en: Michelle married him after a whirlwind romance (= one that happens very suddenly and quickly ) .
sentences.cn: 经过一场旋风式的恋爱，米歇尔嫁给了他。
我们刚刚开始的恋情结束了。

sentences.en: Producers decided to end her on-screen romance with Pierce Lawton.
sentences.cn: 制片人决定结束她在影片中与皮尔斯·劳顿的恋情。

sentences.en: Romance is making a comeback. Reality is out.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义正重新流行起来，而现实主义过时了。

sentences.en: She loved him so much: it was a fairytale romance.
sentences.cn: 她深深爱着他：这是个童话般的浪漫故事。

sentences.en: The romance had gone out of their relationship.
sentences.cn: 他们之间已经没有了爱意。

sentences.en: There is an air of romance about the old inn.
sentences.cn: 这家老客栈颇有些浪漫气氛.

sentences.en: They were quick to dismiss rumours of an off-screen romance.
sentences.cn: 他们迅速否认了两人在现实生活中是情侣关系的传言。

sentences.en: We were very discreet about the romance.
sentences.cn: 我们对这段恋情很谨慎。

words.tran_cn: 浪漫主义者；浪漫主义艺术家
（英）有浪漫主义思想；（英）以浪漫方式进行（等于romanticize）
传奇,冒险故事,恋爱故事

phrases.tran_cn: 罗曼斯语（由拉丁语演变而成的语言）

trans.tran_cn: 浪漫史，爱情小说，恋爱，传奇色彩
trans.tran_en: a story that has brave characters and exciting events
to describe things that have happened in a way that makes them seem more important, interesting etc than they really were

trans.tran_cn: 虚构，渲染，谈情说爱，追求某人
